section.title: configuration of schedule module Configure Schedule
section.para: To configure the Schedule module, select the "Configure Schedule" option. The following screen will appear:
When configuring the Schedule module, you are presented with the following options:

varlistentry.term: planned orders numbering of Next Planned Order #

listitem.para: Enter a number to establish the basis for the next Planned Order Number. Any changes made here will be reflected the next time a new Planned Order is created.
Specify a default Calendar to be used when running the "MPS Detail" report.
Select to enable the Constraint Management system. If not selected, the system will be hidden from view.
Select any of the following order types if want the calendaring system to honor the Site Week and Site Calendar Exceptions when these types of orders are entered.

note.para: When this feature is enabled, users entering order dates will get a warning about non-working days and be prompted to pick the next available working day. For example, the scheduled date on the Sales Order Item screen will not accept dates that are non-working days, as defined on the Site Week calendar.

listitem.para: Select if you want Purchase Orders to honor the Site Week and Site Calendar Exceptions. If not selected, Purchase Orders may be entered for any calendar day.
Select if you want Sales Orders to honor the Site Week and Site Calendar Exceptions. If not selected, Sales Orders may be entered for any calendar day.
Select if you want Transfer Orders to honor the Site Week and Site Calendar Exceptions. If not selected, Transfer Orders may be entered for any calendar day.
Select if you want Work Orders to honor the Site Week and Site Calendar Exceptions. If not selected, Work Orders may be entered for any calendar day.
Select if you want Returns to honor the Site Week and Site Calendar Exceptions. If not selected, Returns may be entered for any calendar day.
